dmca.title: Plagiarism Cease And Desist Order
dmca.body:
===============
This is our formal complaint against the website owner of svmsystems.com whose site is found in Google search results. We believe this site is infringing on our copyrighted website information. We have written the owner of this website and requested the removal of the offending web pages. The owner has not responded to our demand. We request that you review this website and remove it.

(1) Our Copyrighted material is located here:

http://www.easvivr.com

(2) The offending website pages that contain our copyright material are located here:
http://svmsystems.com

BACKGROUND

The following documents the copyright infringement and false promotion and misrepresentation by the owner of the above site.
The owner of the above website has taken our copyrighted material from our above referenced webpages and placed them on his website. 

GOGGLE SEARCH RESULTS


The following is an example of how this website owner is using our copyrighted material. 

http://www.google.co.in/search?q=svmsystems&start=0&ie=utf-8&oe=utf-8&client=firefox-a&rls=org.mozilla:en-US:official
 Web 	Results 1 - 10 of about 76 for svmsystems. (0.47 seconds) 

Web design India, Website Designing India, Indian offshore ...
Prudential India (P) Ltd. - an Indian offshore software development company with specialization is Web Designing & Development,Web design India,Website ...
www.svmsystems.com/ - 25k - Cached - Similar pages

Their web page is copied from our HOME page www.prudentialindia.com.

(3) OUR COMPANY INFORMATION

Prudential India Pvt. Ltd.
A44, Sector 16,
Noida, UP 201301

Owners: Pranav Prakash

Websites:

http://www.prudentialindia.com (Corporate) 


(4) Offending Website Owner

SVMsystems.com
Sunil Verma
RZ-B/122 Mahavir Enclave , Gurdawara Road
Palam,New Delhi 110045
Phone: +91.09811924246

REPRESENTATIONS

I represent that I am an owner of this company and websites and am fully authorized to pursue this matter.

(5) I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law

(6) I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

My contact information is the following:

G.S. Sethi
Vice President, Prudential India Pvt. Ltd..
Gurjot@prudentialindia.com
